titles: A motion tending to the publick good of this age and of posteritie, or, The coppies of certain letters written by Mr. John Dury to a worthy Knight at his earnest desire shewing briefly vvhat a publik good is and how by the best means of reformation in learning and religion it may be advanced to some perfection / published by Samuel Hartlib ...
author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.
Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.
publisher: Printed by P.L. for Michael Sparke, Senior ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Conduct of life --  Early works to 1800.
